alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 6:22PM EDT until August 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest. The river will begin to recede tonight and should fall to fall to 14.5 feet on Wednesday afternoon. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM on Wednesday August 3rd.
